Translations.Text: Ishimwe n’ikuzo byuzuye ni ibya Allah, we wahishuriye umugaragu we (Muhamadi) igitabo (Qur’an), hanyuma ntiyagishyiramo inenge (iyo ari yo yose)

(Yakigize igitabo) kigororotse kugira ngo kiburire (abahakanyi) ibihano bikomeye bituruka kuri we (Allah), ndetse no kugira ngo gihe inkuru nziza abemeramana; babandi bakora ibikorwa byiza, ko bazagororerwa ibihembo byiza (Ijuru)
No kugira ngo kiburire babandi bavuga bati "Allah agira umwana
Yaba bo ndetse n’abakurambere babo, nta bumenyi babifiteho. Mbega ijambo rikomeye risohoka mu minwa yabo (ko Allah afite umwana)! Ibyo bavuga ni ibinyoma
(Yewe Muhamadi) ushobora kuzicwa n’agahinda ku bwo gutera umugongo kwabo (bitandukanya na we), kuko batemera iby’iyi nkuru (Qur’an)
Mu by’ukuri, ibiri ku isi twabigize umutako wayo kugira ngo tubagerageze (abantu), maze tugaragaze abarusha abandigukora ibikorwa byiza
Kandi mu by’ukuri, ibiyiriho (isi) tuzabigira ubutaka bugundutse
Ese ukeka ko abantu bo mu buvumo n’urubaho rwanditsweho (amazina yabo) byari igitangaza mu bigize ibimenyetso byacu
Ibuka ubwo abasore bahungiraga mu buvumo, bakavuga bati "Nyagasani wacu! Duhundagazeho impuhwe ziguturutseho, unaduhe gutungana mu byo dukora
Maze tubapfuka amatwi (turabasinziriza cyane, baguma) mu buvumoimyaka myinshi
Hanyuma turabakangura kugira ngo mu matsinda abiri (yagiye impaka ku gihe bamaze mu buvumo), tumenye iryabashije kumenya igihe bamazemo kurusha irindi
